== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libi/libiec61883, available for all supported architectures (currently still on NEW)
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of gst-plugins-good0.10 0.10.4
** Needed since 0.10.4 for the dv1394 element if built against libraw1394 1.2.1
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=libiec61883|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=libiec61883|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review: potential integer/buffer overflow in deque, but the actually used deque seems to be size-limited; no other grave and obvious bugs found
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'normal'.
** Not yet in Debian <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/330601]]</nowiki>
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.linux1394.org/|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=2252&atid=102252|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
